 Student::Student()
  {
    setGrade(Grade.Pass);
  }

  // COPY CONSTRUCTOR
  //------------------------

 Student::Student(const Student & student)
  {  }

  //------------------------

  {  }

  //------------------------
  // INTERFACE
  //------------------------

  String Student::getGradeFullName()
  {
    String answer = grade.toString();
    return answer;
  }

  Grade Student::getGrade()
  {
    return grade;
  }

  bool Student::setGrade(Grade aGrade)
  {
    grade = aGrade;
    return true;
  }
